citeinfo.origin: Missoula County Public Works Department, Mapping /GIS Division
citeinfo.title: Missoula County Cadastral Parcels

descript.abstract: The Missoula County Cadastral Database is comprised of taxable parcels (fee land) and public land (exempt property). It is not broken down into individual lots, for instance lots 4 & 5, Forest Grove Subdivision may comprise one taxable parcel and the lot line between lots 4 & 5 is not contained in this database. The database encompasses all the area within Missoula County, Montana. Each parcel contains an attribute called geocode that is the parcel identifier. It relates to the geocode in the Montana Dept. of Revenue Computer Assisted Mass Appraisal (CAMA) database. Most of the ancillary attribute information is held in this database. Information such as owner name, legal description, appraised value as well as structural and agricultural data are available within CAMA.
descript.purpose: Display landownership information that is tied to the MT. Dept. of Revenue CAMA database. This data is available for a variety of mapping and query purposes.

idinfo.accconst: This data set is in the public domain, and the recipient may not assert any proprietary rights thereto nor represent it to anyone as other than a data set produced by Missoula County.
idinfo.useconst: User should use caution when overlaying other data sets and should not make legally binding decisions from this data. This data set is provided "as-is" without warranty of any kind, including, but not limited to, the implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose. The user assumes all responsibility for the accuracy and suitability of this data set for a specific application. In no event will the creators or Missoula County be liable for any damages, including lost profits, lost savings, or other incidental or consequential damages arising from the use of or inability to use this data set. This data set is to be used only for general reference."

cntinfo.cntinst: Contact information is provided solely for and limited to data and metadata access for this data layer.

idinfo.datacred: These data are made possible by a public/private partnership.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows Vista Version 6.0 (Build 6001) Service Pack 1; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.1850

dataqual.logic: Topologically clean. Databases checked for standardization.

horizpa.horizpar: The PLSS was digitized from USGS 1:24,000 quad maps and used as control for parcelization. Therefore, this data should be nearly equal to the national map standards used for 1:24,000 scale data. That PLSS net has been updated with survey data for limited areas of the Missoula urban area.

procstep.procdesc: Adjust digitized PLSS where survey data is available (City of Missoula urban area). Using COGO software, calcualte boundaries of all recorded surveys and mosaic together within the PLSS grid. Add in remaining unsurveyed parcels from whatever source could be found (existing deed exhibits, unrecorded surveys, assessor maps).
Maintain parcels using AutoCAD. As new surveys are recorded with Missoula County, they are incorporated into the parcel layer on a weekly basis.
On a monthly basis the AutoCAD township parcel boundary files are converted into feature classes. The feature classes are then mosaiced into a county-wide file.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

enttyp.enttypd: Taxable land parcel as defined by MT. Dept. of Revenue and Missoula County.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

cntinfo.cntinst: Contact information is provided solely for and limited to data and metadata access for this data layer.

distinfo.resdesc:
Missoula County nor any associated partner, nor their employees, makes any warranty, expressed or implied, including the fitness for a particular purpose, or assumes any legal liability responsibility for the accuracy, completeness, or usefulness of any information, apparatus, product, or process disclosed, or represents that its use would not infringe privately owned rights.
In layman's terms: the data does not constitute a legal survey; inaccuracies exist with both the mapped data and the CAMA data; when seeking the definitive description of real property, consult the deed recorded at the Missoula County Courthouse.
State law ( Montana Code Annotated 2-6-109 (1)(a) ) explicitly prohibits State agencies from selling or distributing a list of persons to be used as a mailing list without first securing the permission of those on the list. State law ( MCA 2-6-109 (1)(b) ) also explicitly prohibits anyone from using a list of persons prepared by a state agency as a mailing list without first securing the permission of those on the list. "A person violating the provisions of subsection (1)(b) is guilty of a misdemeanor."

In layman's terms: the data does not constitute a legal survey; inaccuracies exist with both the mapped data and the CAMA data; when seeking the definitive description of real property, consult the deed recorded at the Missoula County Courthouse. State law ( Montana Code Annotated 2-6-109 (1)(a) ) explicitly prohibits State agencies from selling or distributing a list of persons to be used as a mailing list without first securing the permission of those on the list. State law ( MCA 2-6-109 (1)(b) ) also explicitly prohibits anyone from using a list of persons prepared by a state agency as a mailing list without first securing the permission of those on the list. "A person violating the provisions of subsection (1)(b) is guilty of a misdemeanor." This data set is provided "as-is" without warranty of any kind, including, but not limited to, the implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose. The user assumes all responsibility for the accuracy and suitability of this data set for a specific application. In no event will the creators or The University of Montana be liable for any damages, including lost profits, lost savings, or other incidental or consequential damages arising from the use of or inability to use this data set. This data set is to be used only for general reference."
